text:
Two Orioles, Video Compression Engineer, New York, NY, Full time, On Site

At Two Orioles, we're building a team of video compression experts to create the highest-quality video compression algorithms and deliver this to some of the biggest video streaming companies in the business. We're looking for software engineers to enhance and further develop our VP9 and AV1 video encoders. This requires experience in C/C++. Knowledge of (x86) assembly is a plus. Ideal candidates are familiar with or have experience with the AV1, VP9, H264 or HEVC bitstream formats or model software and/or have experience working on (not with) opensource video codec software (x264/5, ffmpeg/libavcodec, libvpx/aom, etc.).

Interested in building tomorrow's video? Email me at liling.lee@twoorioles.com
